0.title: About
0.content: You’re looking for an entry level job in tech. The resources here are to help you land an entry level IT job. Good Luck.

1.title: Applications
1.content: Send out applications and don’t stop sending out applications. The more you send out, the better chance you have.

2.title: Entry Level IT Jobs
2.content: Resources to help you find an entry level IT job.

3.title: Getting started
3.content: I’d suggest signing up for the weekly News Letter. Each week I’ll send you a custom list of entry level IT jobs that you can apply to. Coming soon, there will be some articles and things.

4.title: About the project
4.content: Entry Level Tech Jobs.us is © AGPLv3 2024-2024 by Brian Borncamp .

6.title: Articles
6.content: Written things to help you along the way.

7.title: Interviews
7.content: Don’t stress. Do as many as you can. You’ll get better over time. The more you do, the better you will be.

8.title: Resources for Job Searching
8.content: Start looking for jobs. Don’t stop looking for jobs. If you don’t understand a job posting, have a conversation with chatgpt about it . Try searching with keywords like: Support, Help Desk, Junior, Assistant, Technician, Intern .

9.title: Websites to Explore
9.content: . | 4dayworkweek.io | We Work Remotely | Wellfound | Dynamite Jobs | 80,000 Hours Job Board | Fast Forward Jobs | LinkedIn | Indeed | Google Jobs | Juju | Craigslist | Dice | Stack Overflow Jobs | .

10.title: Additional Resources for Entry-Level IT Jobs
10.content: . | AngelList – Tech startup jobs, often including entry-level positions. | TechCareers – Focused on IT and tech positions, including entry-level roles. | Glassdoor – Job listings with company reviews, often with entry-level IT jobs. | Remote OK – Focuses on remote jobs, including IT roles. | ZipRecruiter – A general job board with plenty of IT and tech roles, including entry-level positions. | SimplyHired – Another general job board that often includes IT job opportunities. | The Muse – Includes entry-level tech roles, often at large, innovative companies. | .

11.title: Climate-Specific Job Boards
11.content: . | Terra.do (climate jobs) | Climatebase | Tech Jobs For Good | .

12.title: Networking and Career Development Resources
12.content: . | Meetup – Local tech groups and events, including job-hunting groups and IT meetups. | .

13.title: Newsletters and Communities
13.content: . | Climate Tech Slack Groups** | MCJ Collective | Work on Climate | .

16.title: Resumes
16.content: Keep it simple in structure. Focus on demonstrating your impact, skills, and projects. Try different things, and see what people respond to . Pretend you already work in IT. Don’t lie. Write your resume focusing on the IT type things you already do .
